examples.text: I d like to stop doing this
It was nice chatting with you
Hello I am looking for some help here
What is a type of The Godfather?
What is the genre of Iron Man?
What is the theme of The Wizard of Oz?
How many did people rate for Grindelwald?
How much does people rate The Bad Guys?
What is the rating of Avengers: Infinity War?
What rate did Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom got??
What year did A Perfect Pairing come out?
What year did Iron Man come out?
What year did Pirate of the Caribbean come out?
What year did Top Gun: Maverick come out?
When did 365 Days: This Day come out?
When did Spider-Man: Homecoming come out?
When was Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tale be released?
Can you give me the most popular movies in 2021?
In 2000, what are the most popular movies for kids?
What are the highest rated drama movies in 2020?
What are the highest rated movies in 1987?
What are the most popular action movies?
What are the most popular movies in 2010?
What are the most popular movies in 2022?
What movies have the highest IMDb in 1999?

intents.description: give the most popular movies with specific genre, year, director, or actor (if any).

examples.text: Can you give me the most recent movies for adults?
Can you give me the recent movies?
What are the latest action movies?
What are the latest movies for kids?
What are the most recent movies?
Can you recommend some movies to watch?
Tell me what movies I should watch
What movies do you suggest I should watch?

values.value: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood

values.text: I didn't understand. You can try rephrasing.
Can you reword your statement? I'm not understanding.
I didn't get your meaning.
Tell me the name of the movie you like
Please give me the name of the movie you like
Please tell me one movie that you love
Would you tell me the name of your favorite movie?
What is your favorite movie? Please tell me the name of it
We cannot catch that. Could you repeat that again?
All values are reset.
Your history is reset.
The system is restarted.

generic.title: How do you rate the list out of 5?

values.text: Hi, I am your smart movie assistant. Nice to meet you!
Hello! Thank you for your interest in our system. I will be your assistant for today!
Welcome to smart movie recommendations. I will be your assistant today :)
Thank you for rating us. I hope you have a great day!
Thank you! enjoy your movies!
I hope you enjoy the movies. We hope to see you again!
